attributes.action: submit to a trial for Treason. In the wake of the Prime Ministers repeated refusal to appear before parliment to answer questions on Iraq, whilst reporting on it to US Iraq study group be charged with Treason.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Prime Minister has refused to answer to the UK parliment, on a number of occasions, regarding the situation in Iraq. 

During this period the Prime Minister reported directly to members & advisors of foreign government regarding the situation in Iraq. 

By answering to a foreign government on issues affecting UK security and armed forces the Prime Minister we the people should demand his arrested and trial for Treason.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
